00031 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_INSET_H
00032 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_INSET_H
00033 
00034 // Checks if a variable is in a fixed set.
00035 template<typename Var>
00036   struct WatchInSetConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00037 {
00038   virtual string constraint_name()
00039     { return "WatchedInSet"; }
00040 
00041   Var var;
00042 
00043   vector<DomainInt> vals;
00044 
00045   template<typename T>
00046   WatchInSetConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _vals) :
00047   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var), vals(_vals.begin(), _vals.end())
00048     { stable_sort(vals.begin(), vals.end()); }
00049 
00050   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00051     { return 2; }
00052 
00053   virtual void full_propagate()
00054   {  
00055     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00056     var.setMin(vals.front());
00057     var.setMax(vals.back());
00058 
00059     if(var.isBound())
00060     {
00061       // May as well pass DomainRemoval
00062       var.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainChanged);
00063       propagate(NULL);
00064     }
00065     else
00066     {
00067       for(int i = 0; i < vals.size() - 1; ++i)
00068         for(DomainInt pos = vals[i] + 1; pos < vals[i+1]; ++pos)
00069         var.removeFromDomain(pos);
00070     }
00071   }
00072 
00073 
00074   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00075   {
00076     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInSet);
00077     // If we are in here, we have a bounds variable.
00078     D_ASSERT(var.isBound());
00079     // This is basically lifted from "sparse int bound vars"
00080     vector<DomainInt>::iterator it_low = std::lower_bound(vals.begin(), vals.end(), var.getMin());
00081     if(it_low == vals.end())
00082     {
00083       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00084     }
00085     else
00086     {
00087       var.setMin(*it_low);
00088     }
00089 
00090     vector<DomainInt>::iterator it_high = std::lower_bound(vals.begin(), vals.end(), var.getMax());
00091     if(it_high == vals.end())
00092     {
00093       var.setMax(*(it_high - 1));
00094       return;
00095     }
00096 
00097     if(*it_high == var.getMax())
00098       return;
00099 
00100     if(it_high == vals.begin())
00101     {
00102       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00103       return;
00104     }
00105 
00106     var.setMax(*(it_high - 1));
00107   }
00108 
00109   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00110   {
00111     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00112     return binary_search(vals.begin(), vals.end(), v[0]);
00113   }
00114 
00115   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00116   { 
00117     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00118     vars.reserve(1);
00119     vars.push_back(var);
00120     return vars;
00121   }
00122 
00123   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00124   {  
00126     for(int i = 0; i < vals.size(); ++i)
00127     { 
00128       if(var.inDomain(vals[i]))
00129       {
00130         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, vals[i]));
00131         return true;
00132       }
00133     }
00134     return false;
00135   }
00136 };
00137 
00138 template<typename VarArray1>
00139 AbstractConstraint*
00140 BuildCT_WATCHED_INSET(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00141 { 
00142   return new WatchInSetConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00143     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0]); 
00144 }
00145 
00146 #endif
